songs.title: Thank You Cloud*
songs.lyrics:
[Snippet]

[Verse: Ellie Goulding]
Clouds full of raindrops ready to fall
Bringing water, clean, clean water down to us all

[Chorus: Ellie Goulding & Elmo]
Thank you Cloud, thank you clouds
(Thank you) For the ponds and the streams now
(Thank you) For the Earth growing green now
Thank you clouds, thank you clouds
